game_description: Indie racing game with retro-monochrome visual style and fake car physics for fun casual playing. This demo version contains one track and one game mode.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Russian, Russian (Ukraine), Spanish (Spain)
review_1: The graphical style may be off-putting to some people, but thanks to it this runs absolutely smooth on Quest. Handles a bit like Dirt Rally, though of course only fake handling with no real physics or even jumps. Still something great can come out of this demo eventually... hopefully multiplayer but I know few will be able to handle this without barfing... but keep it up, it's a blast for those who can.
review_2: A fun little simple racer, easy enough to control and I liked the look of it all.
review_3: I just want PS4 controller support
